comment.author: 92747288@N03
comment._content:
Macquarie Street, Hobart. Takes up the full block between Elizabeth Street and Argyle Street.

Now used by the Hobart City Council. Beautiful foyer depicting the names of serving officers.

comment.author: 99479038@N00
comment._content: Occupies the site of the original Government House, and has been used as offices and function rooms by the Hobart City Council since 1866.  More modern additions were built fronting on to Davey Street. The eastern corner of the city block is occupied by the former city library, and now by the maritime Museum of Tasmania
